data.author: Arthur C. Clarke
data.quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: It's only after you've stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

data.author: Paulo Coelho
data.quote: Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: When defeat comes, accept it as a signal that your plans are not sound, rebuild those plans, and set sail once more toward your coveted goal.

data.author: Lily Tomlin
data.quote: I said 'Somebody should do something about that.' Then I realized I am somebody.

data.author: Christopher McCandless
data.quote: The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.

data.author: C.S. Lewis
data.quote: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.

data.author: Jack Welch
data.quote: Face reality as it is, not as it was or as you wish it to be.

data.author: Nathan W. Morris
data.quote: Edit your life frequently and ruthlessly. It's your masterpiece after all.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: Talent is a wonderful thing, but it won't carry a quitter.

data.author: Morrie Camhi
data.quote: We see things not as they are, we see them as WE are.

data.author: Ken Robinson
data.quote: Curiosity is the engine of achievement.

data.author: Tehmina Durrani
data.quote: I found an inner strength to fight for myself. It was clear that nobody else would.

data.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
data.quote: The heights charm us, but the steps do not; with the mountain in our view we love to walk the plains.

data.author: Mohammed Ali Bapir
data.quote: Let your action manifest your thought, your belief and your passion.

data.author: Bill Rodgers
data.quote: I often lose motivation, but it's something I accept as normal.

data.author: Wendy Tremayne
data.quote: Start even if you don't know how.

data.author: Babe Ruth
data.quote: Never allow the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game!

data.author: L.M. Fields
data.quote: It doesn't matter where you've been, only where you are going.

data.author: Richie Norton
data.quote: To become who you want to become, make decisions that THAT person would make, TODAY.

data.author: Dragos Bratasanu
data.quote: Flow is a state of being when we are completely focused, and fully immersed in what we are doing. In flow our work seems effortless, creativity goes into overdrive, we feel inspired, and motivation springs forth from within.

data.author: Greg Daugherty
data.quote: Rejected pieces aren't failure; unwritten pieces are.

data.author: Dawn Garcia
data.quote: We are not who we come from. We are who we allow ourselves to become.

data.author: M.L. Shanahan
data.quote: Fight everyday for a better life.

data.author: Qwana Reynolds-Frasier
data.quote: Practice makes the hard things easy.
